comments:
I see the exception below the first time I launch the CDT debugger in an Eclipse
session.

- Reproduceable. 
- New since yesterday.
- The second time I launch the debugger, I don't see the exception.

When examining the CDT code, I see that there is a libpty.so for Linux, but that
there is no pty.dll committed for Win32.

I don't know what "pty" is, but I can't see any adverse effects w.r.t. embedded
development.

?yvind

Update again, we remove the log trace.
It should be of no consequence.
